title: Miss Universe presenter Steve Harvey offers to help Warren Beatty through his Oscars mistake - because he did it too
text:
Miss Universe presenter Steve Harvey offers to help Warren Beatty through his Oscars mistake - because he did it too Steve announced the wrong winner at Miss Universe 2015 Share Comments By Vicki Newman 14:10, 27 FEB 2017 Updated 14:37, 27 FEB 2017 Celebs Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next Miss Universe Canada crowned the wrong beauty as Watch this video again Watch Next Australia's Next Top Model ended horribly when mi 2:35 John Travolta Makes Massive Mess of Idina Menzel' 0:31 Emmy of the state: Aisha Tyler opens winner envel 1:10 Miss Colombia has her say on the Miss Universe sc 1:09 Miss Germany has some STRONG words after the Miss 0:55 HAS IAN BRADY'S SHOTGUN JUST BEEN FOUND ON SADDLE 1:19 Chrissy Teigen teases John Legend over lack of Os 'Are we on dope?' Anne Marie Morris goes on the o 0:55 Horror as huge rat runs rings round KFC staff bef 0:58 Four jailed for staged armed robbery at Rishton P 0:42 Family speak of horror as stroke victim faces thr 1:10 James Bowen discusses his story and how Bob the C 4:16 Video will play in Share this video Watch Next celebs Steve Harvey has reached out to Warren Beatty after his embarrassing Oscars gaffe got the whole world talking - because he knows exactly how it feels.
Warren - alongside Faye Dunaway - wrongly announce La La Land as the winner of Best Picture at the 89th Academy Awards on Sunday.
The cast and crew, including stars Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling, took to the stage and began making their acceptance speeches before it was pointed out that Moonlight had actually won the coveted prize.
Read More The Best Picture mix-up wasn't the only gaffe at this year's Oscars as mistake leaves film producer devastated Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway read out the wrong winner (Photo: AFP) The cast and crew were halfway through their acceptance speech when they were told they hadn't actually won (Photo: Getty) Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next Jennifer Aniston chokes up as she introduces in m Watch this video again Watch Next Jimmy Kimmel live tweets Donald Trump from the Os 1:04 Jimmy Kimmel shows off an Oscars edition of Mean 2:06 Warren Beatty appears confused as Faye Dunaway re 0:29 Emma Stone wins Best Actress 2:12 HAS IAN BRADY'S SHOTGUN JUST BEEN FOUND ON SADDLE 1:19 Noo Noo from the Teletubbies pokes Holly Willough 0:42 Daniel Levy takes swipe at Arsenal stadium 0:33 Chrissy Teigen teases John Legend over lack of Os David Haye and Tony Bellew face-off during heated 1:39 John Major believes Brexit voters made a 'histori 1:09 Video will play in La La Land read out instead of Moonlight in Oscar mix up Share this video Watch Next Since then, the entire world has been talking about Warren's mistake, and Steve knows all too well how stressful that can be.
Back in 2015, the comedian announced the wrong person as the winner of Miss Universe.
Steve announced Miss Colombia as the winner and allowed her to start celebrating her victory.
But as contestant Ariadna Gutierrez-Arévalo waltzed around the stage with a crown on, Steve came back to reveal first prize actually belonged to Miss Philippines.
A quick turnaround saw the crown being popped onto contestant Pia Alonzo Wurtzbach's head while Steve hung his head in shame.
Read More Imagine being told you've won an Oscar then having it taken away? Poor John Legend's face says it all Steve wrongly announced Ariadna Gutierrez as the winner of Miss Universe 2015 (Photo: Getty Images) She got to wear the crown for a few seconds before it was taken back (Photo: Reuters) Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch Next Mini Honey G entertains X Factor fans at NEC Watch this video again Watch Next Louis Walsh's brother defies death in helicopter 0:30 H&M collaborates on “Spring Icons” campaign with 1:30 Halle Berry posts cheeky video of her skinny dipp 0:58 Everyone want to know what Ryan Gosling said to t 0:30 Mariah Carey suffers major fashion fail as she bu 0:31 Chrissy Teigen gets caught napping during the Osc 0:32 Video will play in Share this video Watch Next Steve still hasn't quite lived the gaffe down and therefore knows Warren has a lot more stick to come.
In a display of solidarity, Steve tweeted out a message to Warren.
Read More Oscars 2017 Oscars pay tribute to Bill Paxton Who is Jordan Horowitz? Ben Affleck is 'embarassing big brother' Oscars 2017 best dressed Who won Oscars 2017? How DID the Oscars mix-up happen? Oscars 2017 worst dressed Conspiracy theories Andrew and Emma break hearts Quote: : "Call me Warren Beatty. I can help you get through this!"
Could there be a better man for the job?
Stick together, guys! It'll all blow over soon ... probably.
